specifications.Finish: Decoration > Embroidery Embroidery is a decorative finishing that uses different stitches, yarns, and materials to create patterns on the fabric. This process adds visual interest, texture, and a handcrafted feel.
specifications.Dye Method: Pigment Dye Pigment dye applies color to the fabric surface without penetrating the fibers, creating a vintage, faded look. It offers a soft, unique appearance but may fade more easily with washing.
specifications.Care Advice: Natural > Silk Silk can be damaged by sweat and other acidic substances. It may also fade if left in the sun for too long. Store it in a place without direct sunlight. Dye Method > Pigment Dye Pigment dyed fabrics are intended to fade and alter in color gradually over time. so it requires special care in handling.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Dresses
